Translate.phrase: Error: You must first select a job category.
Welcome to your Career Management Center
These qualifications have or will expire within
You do not have any qualifications that will expire within the next
A job you have targeted is open. Click on the link below to find out more information.
There are no openings for the jobs you are interested in.
We can monitor when jobs you are interested in become available. To set up the jobs you would like us to monitor, click
If you would like to create an Action Plan where you can define career goals, or identify key projects or tasks and associated target dates, click the Create Plan button.
This information will be available for your manager to review to help you accomplish your goals
Explore careers allows you to see what jobs exist in your company and to compare your qualifications to those required for the job.
Select a job title to create a profile.
Select a category to create a job list.

To find other jobs that match your qualifications, click on the Create Job List button.

If you would like to add other interest areas to your qualification job search, you may select them.
Error: Please select a job before you create a profile.
There are no qualifications defined for you or the job you selected at this time.
There are no qualifications defined for the job you selected. What you will see are your qualifications only.
There are no qualifications listed for you. What you will see are qualifications defined for the job only.
Currently, there are no jobs associated with this category.

Select up to 3 jobs you are interested in.

When a job opens, we will notify you on My Action Plan page.
Error: Please select a job to update.
Your job alert has been updated.
Your job alerts have been updated.
Error: Please check the box for a job description to apply for that job.
Review your action plan goals. Look for alert notifications on job openings or expired qualifications.
Compare your qualifications to those required for your job. See where there are gaps.
View a summary of your knowledge, skills, abilities, certifications and education.
Apply for a job or view a list of current job openings.
Find out what jobs exist in your company. Search by type or qualifications criteria.
Find the training you need by category, or by defining criteria.
Error: Layer not able to be dimmed
Error: Layer not able to be lit
Error: You cannot use Manager Career Management. Currently, you do not have any direct reports.
Select a job and an employee to create an individual profile.
Select a job to create an employee profile.
Select a job to create a profile.
Currently, there are no jobs defined for the criteria you have entered (based on all job requirements or essential requirements only).
The jobs listed below are based on essential and non-essential job requirements.
The jobs listed below are based on essential job requirements only. There were no jobs defined based on all job requirements.
Currently, there are no jobs defined for the criteria you have entered (based on all job requirements or essential requirements only).
The jobs listed are based on essential and non-essential job requirements.
The jobs listed are based on essential job requirements only. There were no jobs defined based on all job requirements.
Select a job to create an employee profile.
Select a job to create a profile.
Error: Currently, there are no qualifications defined.
There are employees with gaps for this course
Currently, there are no courses associated with this employee gap.
There is no information to display for this type of qualification. Please check other tabs.
Currently, there are no courses associated with this qualification.
Select one of your direct reports to view their Individual Profile.
To view competency, certification or education detail, or to see what training courses are available for the gaps identified, click on the qualification you are interested in.
There are no qualifications defined for you or your job at this time.
There are no qualifications defined for your job. What you will see are your qualifications only.
There are no qualifications listed for you. What you will see are qualifications defined for the job only.
Error: Please select an employee for whom you wish to add a qualification.
To view detail, click on qualfication.
To add a qualification, click on the Add Qualification button.
Select one of your direct reports to view their qualification detail.
There is no detail to display.
Select the employee you would like to enroll
Error: Please select a session to register.
Error: There are no sessions that exist for the course
Error: There are no prerequisites defined for the course
Error: Please select a category before you create a course list.
Currently, there are no courses associated with the selected qualification criteria.
Currently, there are no courses offered for the qualification you have selected.
Currently, there are no courses associated with this category.
Error: Please select qualification criteria before you create a course list.
There is no information to display for this type of qualification. Please check other tabs.
Select a course category to view a list of training courses your company offers within that category.
Select a qualification to search for courses offered by the company. If multiple qualifications are selected, the system will search for all courses that address any of the qualifications selected.

To view training for gaps, you must first select an employee. A gap list will be created based on the employee's current job or position.

From there, click on a qualification to see what courses are offered by the company.

A Qualification gap list has been created based on your current job or position.

Click on a qualification to see what courses are offered by the company.
There is no Action Plan to display for the employee you selected.
There is no detail to display at this time.
Select one of your direct reports to view their Action Plan.

Explore Careers enables you to see what jobs exist in your company and to compare an employee's qualifications to those required for the job.

Select a job title and an employee to create an employee profile.

Explore Careers allows you to see what jobs exist in your company and to compare an employee's qualifications to those required for the job.

Select a category to view jobs associated with that category.
To find other jobs that match your employee's qualifications, select an employee, then click the Create Job List button.
If you would like to add other interest areas to the job search, you may select them.
Error: To create a profile, you must select a job title and an employee.
Error: Please select a job title.
There are no qualifications defined for the employee or job you selected at this time.
There are no qualifications defined for your selected job. What you will see are the selected employee's qualifications only.
There are no qualifications listed for the selected employee. What you will see are qualifications defined for the selected job only.
Error: Please select employee and job criteria.
There are no competencies/qualifications defined for this job.
No qualification gaps exists for the criteria you have selected.
You may select all of your direct reports, or up to a maximum of 10 on an individual basic. Please reenter your criteria.
There is no information to display for this type of qualification. Please check other tabs.
Select the employees you would like to include
Select the job you would like to compare them against
The profile displays a summary of qualification gaps, and identifies which employees possess the gaps.
Use employee's current job or position
There are no qualifications defined for the employee or job you selected at this time.
There are no qualifications defined for the employee's job. What you will see are the employee's qualifications only.
There are no qualifications listed for the employee. What you will see are qualifications defined for the employee's job only.
Compare an employee's qualifications to those required for their job. See where there are gaps.
Review your employee's action plan goals. See additional detail regarding reviews and training.
View an individual profile of your employee's knowledge, skills, abilities, certifications and education.
See what jobs exist in your company. Search by type or qualification criteria. Compare your employee to the job.
Enroll your employees in the training they need. Search by category or criteria.
View a summary of your direct reports' job qualification gaps.
Create an employee profile for this job
Select a qualification of this type
View training courses to fill job gap for this qualification
View details for this performance review
View training history for this course
View training registration details for this course
Graph Comparing Employee and Job Proficiencies
View training courses to fill job gap for this employee
View employees with a job gap for this qualification
You do not have access to any related bookmark links.
This table displays action plan information. The first row contains the employee's next review date, followed by an action plan.
This table displays prerequisites for training course {0}. Each row contains a different field, such as type, description, and from date.
This table displays qualifications related to the employee's job or position. Fields included are type, whether the qualification is essential to the job, and percent of time.

This table compares the employee's qualifications to those required for a job. Each row contains a qualification, the employee's current proficiency level, and the proficiency level required for the job.
This table lists employee performance reviews. Each row contains a scheduled date and description. Click on a row for more detailed information about the review.
This table displays detailed information for performance review {0}. Each row contains a different field, such as date held, rating, and reviewed by.
This table lists employee training course history. Each row contains a description and completion date. Click on a row for more detailed information about the course.
This table displays detailed information for training course {0}. Each row contains a different field, such as course, status, and rating.
This table lists employee training course registrations. Each row contains a description and start date. Click on a row for more detailed information about the course.
This table displays detailed registration information for training course {0}. Fields such as course, status, and confirmation date are included.
This table lists sessions for course {0}. Information for each session takes up five rows. Select a session to register.
